website_summaries.verdict: Craftsman prides itself on quality, and this portable tool chest is no exception. We like the safety lock mechanism and the sliding ball bearing drawers. Great gift idea for a handyman.
pros: Drawers stay locked between uses, safer for children
Craftsman product with reputation for quality
cons: Top lid must be opened to unlock other drawers
Some drawers can wobble or become unbalanced
No separate space for small tools and parts

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this tool box
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like to write poor reviews, but needed to take the time to write one about this tool chest. I bought it to secure my tools in the engine room of a boat. Unfortunately, the drawers do not stay closed. When you use the drawers to put in actual tools, the weight of the tools opens the drawers and the chest starts to tip over. If you need this box to move tools from one location to the next you will develop bloody forehead syndrome. Do not buy this box, you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nyberg

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had already reviewed this. This tool box lioks and functions exactly like the same Craftsman tool box I bought 40 years ago. The new one sits alongside the old one. The price is good as is the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gustaf Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Drawer design much easier to use
customer_reviews.text: Old tool chest didn't have drawers and so had to dig for everything; this design is much better. Not so huge that I can't carry it where it's needed, but plenty big enough for the tools I use frequently. Have the old one (also Craftsman) to store less used stuff. Drawers snap into closed position (need to listen for that to be sure it's in there) to keep them secure.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Lytton

customer_reviews.title: The tool box I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: Best tool box ever, keeps all my heavy wrenches organized in the drawers and separate from my smaller tools. The drawers open and close smoothly, and they lock closed in place when the lid is closed so they don't slide open when carrying the tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great little toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Like others have pointed out, you have to have the top open to unlock the drawers. You can then close the top and push the drawers back in but you might surprise yourself when you go to pick it up and your drawers come flying out along with everything inside. Another thing that I think wasn't explicitly stated was that this has a handle on top which all the pictures seem to leave out. I don't know the exact material but it is some sort of plastic handle. I'm also not sure if there is some reinforcement in the handle so it may or may not be a point of failure.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Ad is wrong! Don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: Ad shows a red metal "made in USA" three draw tool box. I received a red plastic "made in China" three draw tool box. Don't buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It feels like it's under spring tension
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes when you open the lid, and open up the 3 racks, and then close all 3 racks, the top lid will not close. It feels like it's under spring tension. Under further examination, it's because one of the drawers recieving slot is bent. Still haven't found a fix, but I will be needing to bend the metal to make it function like normal. But if the tool box is closed and if you tug on a drawer, it will bend the metal and force this to happen. Wish it was a little stronger but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Olson

customer_reviews.title: Draws dont lock
customer_reviews.text: the draws don't lock in whe the toplatch is close,they opens up as nd it should not work like that,it supposed to stau lock all draws or trays whatever u call them it should stay lock when the top piece is close,very poor design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Storage for Tools
customer_reviews.text: Had this toolbox a number of years ago and really liked it, but I passed it along to a family member. Missing it and finding that the tool bags were not cutting it (no pun intended), I went on the search for a replacement. Was happy to find this and purchased. The toolbox is of sturdy construction and the doors slide easily, even when loaded. The drawers can be removed for easy cleaning or placement of lining material. The locking bar can also be defeated so that you can slide drawers out without opening the lid. Very happy with purchase, delivery and quality of this toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, solid toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, heavy duty tool box. High quality sliding drawers. The drawers do not come out unless you open the top lid first. Good feature in case you are moving it around. It does have some weight to it, especially when loaded up with tools. But even empty this thing is not lightweight. Fits all my tools perfectly. Built to last. This toolbox will probably outlive me.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Gagnebin

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely in our RV basement
customer_reviews.text: For the price this item fits my pocket and needs, i can carry all my tools too and fro, from house or with us on trips in the RV. Fits nicely in our RV basement.
customer_reviews.author: Ed1950

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special, but good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm old enough to remember when Craftsman really was a quality American tool brand, one that you went to a Sears & Roebuck store to buy. Different world. These days, you know they must be manufacturing in Asia to stay competitive. Anyway, I decided on this box, based on reviews of what's available on Amazon, and on a little bit of residual faith in Craftsman. Mine showed up in perfect condition, and everything lines-up properly and works as it should. Quality seems essentially identical to a pair of Kobalt boxes that I also have. For the reasonable price of this box, I'm happy with what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lorenson

customer_reviews.title: What can you say it's a Craftsman
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Took 2 days. This tool box is quite a bit larger than I thought. a pleasant surprise. I have had several of Craftsman boxes over the years and you just can't beat them for quality. I looked at other boxes before deciding on this one. The others were a few bucks cheaper, but I wanted quality and Craftsman tool boxes never disappoint. Love how smooth the drawers open and lock. Highly recommend. Would buy again. Of course all you guys out there know how good it is so I won't say more. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kittylover

customer_reviews.title: narrow depth
customer_reviews.text: The depth is about 8", so not deep enough to hold many tools.
customer_reviews.author: Deb in Texas

customer_reviews.title: VALUE FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I think for the money this is the best portable tool chest I could find/buy. Keeps tools organized with the drawers so that you don't have to hunt for them. Painted on the inside too so hopefully it won't rust as quickly. Nice looking as well. The latches helped sell me on this tool box as this will be the most likely failure points.
customer_reviews.author: D. WILDS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice for Small Space
customer_reviews.text: Finally a way to organize the few tools I have for fixes around the condo! Added some gripping shelf liner.
customer_reviews.author: Terry W. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Came with rust bubbles on the lid, under the ...
customer_reviews.text: Came with rust bubbles on the lid, under the paint. Craftsman ain't what it used to be. Too much of a pain to return this item and there is no Sears nearby here.
customer_reviews.author: CGR, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: This is not your fathers Craftsman
customer_reviews.text: Cheap rickety over priced piece of crap. I dont really care if its made in China but you can def get better "made in china" crap than this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hobby box
customer_reviews.text: If I had purchased this toolbox for lightweight hobby paraphernalia I would have given it three stars across the board. I had planned on storing real tools in the drawers but the slides are so flimsy and the metal is so thin that I’ve decided to keep it for the sole purpose of storing lightweight plastic tools. Even so, I doubt if the slides will last a year. My last last craftsman toolbox lasted 20 years. Call this one a hobby box and sell it for $40 and I’ll recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: BEEts

customer_reviews.title: This tool box is horrible
customer_reviews.text: The drawers wont stay shut even though it is latched.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bachmann

customer_reviews.title: great box very good price
customer_reviews.text: the box arrived on time and in perfect condition, can't say the same for the outer box it came in fortunately it was padded very well. The drawers move very freely and smooth, with just a slight urge when closing this lets you know they are home. The drawer locks are very good
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Kanar

customer_reviews.title: UNIMPRESSIVE & UN-CRAFTSMAN-LIKE. I WOULDN'T BUY IT AGAIN NOR WOULD I RECOMMEND IT.
customer_reviews.text: Unimpressive and un-Craftsman-like. While the drawers and bearings were decent, the box itself arrived with minor damage, and the locking lid failed to work on all three of the drawers, making it useless for any sort of movement or travel.
customer_reviews.author: Wingnut

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.text: Got this a gift for someone and when I got it. The clasps arnt aligned. Otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Good Old Craftsman Quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven't purchased Craftman products in years sine there is no more store near me. Wasn't sure if the quality would be the same. Product meets my expectations. It is great size for my bench and is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: pjderick

customer_reviews.title: Almost got that Craftsman Quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this chest alot better than some of the alternatives out there. Heavy duty, roller bearing drawers. I wish I could have found the older 2 drawer unit as this one can be a bit heavy and bulky to cart around. Either I need to break it in or the drawers are a bit tight, especially when trying to close all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoors Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This toolbox is built with reasonably heavy gauge steel and ball bearing slides, making it a good value. It will ride around in the back of my truck (in my truck tool box) for the next few years. I believe it will prove to be a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Wildlife

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Enough to fit all my tools in. While carrying this around, it feels a bit off center and it doesn't lock its shelves properly sometimes, but overall its good enough for my apartment complex.
customer_reviews.author: Mika the Cat

customer_reviews.title: Good size for basic set of tools
customer_reviews.text: Typical Craftsman quality. I bought this after returning a Grease Monkey tool box that was smaller, cheaply made (no drawer slides) and more expensive. Good size for basic set of tools.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Lock on the drawers are useless most the time
customer_reviews.text: Its a toolbox, bought for work but the locking mechanism on the drawers is inconsistent, in my use only the top drawer locks when top lid is shut..... which is kinda useless for me since its a work toolbox ment to be kept at work.
customer_reviews.author: Cannibal Candy

customer_reviews.title: Good for condo or apartment
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for what I needed. 3 drawer design works well but sometimes the top hatch doesn’t catch the rear hook so the drawers will open on their own if it’s not on a level ground.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The tool chest is very sturdy and great for organizing small tools.
customer_reviews.author: DLF

customer_reviews.title: Nice for tools
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift for my grandson. Along with a chest toolbox. He was so happy he even gave me the biggest hug ever. He’s 15 and likes to work on anything.
customer_reviews.author: Cola1bear

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes when you close the lid it doesn't always catch the drawers to lock them.
customer_reviews.author: Asa Witte

customer_reviews.title: a place for my fathers tools
customer_reviews.text: With th inheritance of my fathers tools, i have filled the box with his many fine tools. It will get lots of use as do my other tools boxes
customer_reviews.author: castman54

customer_reviews.title: 25 pound rated ball bearing slides on the drawers.
customer_reviews.text: the box that this toolbox came in clearly states "25 pound rated ball bearing slides" so the drawers probably have ball bearings. I like the tool box, but wish it had 2-side-handles, and now own four of them. So these outnumber the 1plastic 3 drawer version by craftsman.1 2-drawer steel version by crafsman, 2 "cat" toolboxes, 1 stackon, 1 waterloo and 2 no drawer craftsman boxes. I have had zero failures with any of the boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: The drawers aren't quite as deep as I thought, but I love this. I really have no intention of carrying it anywhere, it is strictly for storage. I'd love to figure out how to remove the lid so I can have the top open, and flush against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Lenora G.

customer_reviews.title: This small ,but still good value!
customer_reviews.text: Only thing wrong it's small! I could not get my tap and dye set into it , but I will make do til buy bigger gotten tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great tool box strong
customer_reviews.text: Great tool box strong , sturdy and very well made holds all my tools very nicely shipping was fast and packing was neat can't go wrong with craftsman very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: James Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice little toolbox, been using it to move my tools from truck to truck, I've had no issues with it so far, so I'm actually planning on buying a second one for the rest of my tools.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J Wickersham

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Crucial to maintain a clean and organized workstation. I have yet to find anything better than Craftsman.
customer_reviews.author: Teeks

customer_reviews.title: Nice three drawer portable tool box
customer_reviews.text: Came in fast and this box is exactly what I was looking for. Small enough to carry around and big enough to hold lots of hand tools.
customer_reviews.author: H1Can2

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this. When it is filled with tools it is heavy. Very heavy. ( ore so than if the toolbox were plastic) That is the only downside.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gold

customer_reviews.title: Quality toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Insanely fast shipping. Mine was shipped from a local Sears and arrived next day. Quality build, plenty of space.
customer_reviews.author: BobaFettuccine

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty tool box, great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: My husbands tool box took a ride off the top of the truck and landed on the roadway. Luckily the contents did not spill all over the place but once opened it was damaged and would not close again so we purchased another to replace it. It's a great toolbox!
customer_reviews.author: RondaS

customer_reviews.title: Good box
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty good box. You can buy a made in USA one from craftsman that is exactly the same. I would recommend the USA one.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: No problem here !!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son who is just starting to obtain tools for car repair. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Nuccio

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat Craftsman
customer_reviews.text: Craftsman quality tool box for medium weight tools. Good value for the low price. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for down sizing from a garage workshop to condo living.
customer_reviews.text: When size matters this a perfect size between a tool box and a tool chest.
customer_reviews.author: skierjoe

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Woodshop Lathe Accessories
customer_reviews.text: Using it in the wood shop for the lathe. Drawers are not perfectly aligned so it hangs up when trying to close it, just a jiggle or two and it closes but lost a star for that.
customer_reviews.author: Wildlife

customer_reviews.title: Nice box for the money
customer_reviews.text: my son loves it I thought it was a nice box for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Man Gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. He got it for Fathers Day.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline C Beaumont

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for "consolidating" like items.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple to help me consolidate like items - e.g. Drill Bits - Taps & Dies - Screwdrivers. Drawers are just deep enough for most items.
customer_reviews.author: R. Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my garage needs
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my garage needs. I bought some liners which I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dean from St. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So far it's held up well to abuse and banging around.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman toolbox
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Craftsman 3-drawer metal portable chest toolbox, just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: jamie craft

customer_reviews.title: Decent toolbox.
customer_reviews.text: Metal is not as heavy as I thought it would be. The drawer lock can be a bit touchy. Still, overall a decent box for the price.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: ANOTHER GREAT CRAFTSMAN PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Great Craftsman product. Got one for my husband. Like the one I got him 30 years ago
customer_reviews.author: Pecas

customer_reviews.title: I will find a good one I hope
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made the draws come out you can not walk with it in a closed position. A storm took all our home. Our old box lasted years. I had this 8 months and basically did not move it. I have to pick it up with two hands afraid the top will open as well as the draws "opening". I will find a good one I hope. Maybe we will make a crushing video for items that are not good.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Pipitone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value and with the Craftsman name it has some quality behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Lovasco

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Not the same grade of steel as my other Craftsman tool boxes but works for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Clark

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should... only wish that it were larger.
customer_reviews.text: It holds most of my smaller tools such as screwdrivers, ratchets, etc. No real room for a hammer... I keep that in my tool bag.
customer_reviews.author: Obsidian

customer_reviews.title: Clips where a little bent. Great tool box!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool box fits every Thain I need had to down size from my 4 draw tool box so it would fit in my truck box. Worked out great gave it 4 stars for the locking clips where all bent up. Nothing. A hammer can't fix
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This toolbox is solid and well-built. Quality construction with no rough edges.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Childers

customer_reviews.title: Real value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great looking. Drawers worked well. Real value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Swistak

customer_reviews.title: Tool Box review
customer_reviews.text: Craftsman is always been a real great product will never get anything other than Craftsman
customer_reviews.author: James R Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with purchase. Replaced the same Item I have used for eighteen years.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Paying for the name
customer_reviews.text: The drawers are touchy and you have to make sure to hold them in fully when closing the lid or else they'll slide open. The quality was much less than what I expected and have previously gotten from Craftsman products
customer_reviews.author: Russo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered came packaged good no scratches or anything. I can't wait to show him for Christmas. Also quick shipping
customer_reviews.author: taylar

customer_reviews.title: Very good 3-drawer portable toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Well-made and well worth the price. Depending on what tools you store in it, you might just want to leave it on the workbench.
customer_reviews.author: Archimedes

customer_reviews.title: NIce Storage for Tools and Misc.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good storage, the drawers work well. It is easy to access everything you put into. Had it awhile and it still works as new. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mart

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for making sure I got this by my husband's birthday. Just as described and a great deal for the price
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K Yount

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Craftsman toolboxes are the best. Well made, strong and the drawers work smoothly even when loaded with tools. I only have Craftsman toolboxes. They last and the drawers always work smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond S. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: A good box.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy I bought this toolbox, and I would buy it again. The one minor issue I have is that you can't unlock the drawers without opening the top lid. It's not a big deal, and the lock would be great if I was traveling with it. But, for a box that's going to sit on a shelf, it's an inconvenience. 10 years from now, I'm sure I'll have completely adapted, and forgotten that I ever had an issue with it.
customer_reviews.author: Day Man

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toolbox.
customer_reviews.text: Great toolbox, just what i needed to organize my stuff. Just wish it had handles on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Chewd

customer_reviews.title: Quality box at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Very good box. I've gone through 3 or 4 tool bags in the last 7 years. I should be all set with this box.
customer_reviews.author: Motorbreath

customer_reviews.title: Nice toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Good quality, enough space for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly F.

customer_reviews.title: tool chest excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: I used the tool box for my accumulation of tools . It is the perfect size and value for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: judith pero

customer_reviews.title: Bought one, had to have another.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Craftsman box I’ve owned. Sturdy and rugged yet a perfect size for being portable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tough toolbox
customer_reviews.text: On the farm we have our toolboxes out in the weather. The cover over the back hinge keeps our tools dry. The riveted latches are strong also.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Kuzak

customer_reviews.title: The drawers don't lock?
customer_reviews.text: The drawers slide out when carrying, there seems to be no locking device for drawers, am I missing something?
customer_reviews.author: PJSD78

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I don't move it at all at work so I can't speak to the portability of it. I couldn't use most toolbox as the space I have is only 23 inches beneath the work bench, Most toolboxes are a standard 26 inches so this was just what the doctor ordered. Should have order it years ago
customer_reviews.author: Phil T

customer_reviews.title: Okay, kinda of flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This tool box is okay. The drawers don't pull out very smoothly and they tend to roll open on their own. It is not very sturdy but meets my needs which are minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Timbers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really great for the tools I need to travel with on occasion. Love the organizational aspect.
customer_reviews.author: d-dub

customer_reviews.title: Quality toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and quality built toolbox. It is heavy without the tools, just as a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: JammieJo

customer_reviews.title: Nice toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Good size for what we needed, a supplemental tool box to keep in the basement. Sturdily made.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie W Heitman

customer_reviews.title: Love the sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: I really like the metal box. But it's not setup for screws etc.
customer_reviews.author: Darshan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves his new tool box. Absolutely LOVE that it locks the drawers when the lid is down! Keeps my two year old out of the tools!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy B Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Functional toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and good draw space. Draws do not lock.
customer_reviews.author: David Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: he seems to really like it.
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my husband, he seems to really like it.
customer_reviews.author: CalifasBabydoll

customer_reviews.title: but very happy with it for the
customer_reviews.text: Not the toughest box around, but very happy with it for the price
customer_reviews.author: DonCon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Substantial and just the right size! Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman continues to be the best in the business
customer_reviews.text: Craftsman continues to be the best in the business. Are they made as sturdy as they were 30 years ago? No but this compares very favorably with other manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that you can tell when the drawers are in far enough to lock
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Item!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son who requested Craftsman. Durable, spacious, very nice. He loved
customer_reviews.author: Carol Knight

customer_reviews.title: Its very durable and had a good weight to it
customer_reviews.text: Its well made and exactly what my mom wanted. Its very durable and had a good weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the grandson to start his tool locker and keep other family members from removing tools and not return
customer_reviews.author: Stan Reames

customer_reviews.title: Chraftsman 3-drawer tool chest
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a Christmas present. Exactly what they wanted. Love Sears products with the lifetime guarantee. Too bad other makers don't follow their lead...
customer_reviews.author: Charles Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Brother in law was happy because its what he wanted on his Amazon wish list ;)
customer_reviews.author: Scott Stein

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman Tool Box
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it is portable and easy for me to carry around to different places.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: It did what it was supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right amount of space for my bicycle repair tools.
customer_reviews.author: james reece
